Settings Edit Delete Delete All Slow Fast Colors Default Undo Please click on one of the items to start viewing Other Settings Save Changes Error while retrieving file. No file selected, can not continue. File contents successfully read. Select file Delete Click yes to delete selected files! Yes No Title is very short Make it 6 characters at least Script is very short Make it 100 words at least Privacy Policy Text transparency Background transparency To view the full text content and run the presentation click here Mark the ease of reading line selection Click here to turn text scrolling on or off To manually add new text To add text from the internal memory device Add text from your Google Drive files from your own Google Drive account Click here to show different input options Loading
No Permission Unavailability of permissions will render Teleprompter not to function correctly.

 Please reopen the application or go to Settings, if you wish to grant permission.
EXIT /Teleprompter/ VIDEO PHOTO Photo Video MODE VIDEO SAVED IMAGE SAVED "image/jpeg" "video/mp4" No Videos Delete Media Load Media Do you want to delete the %1$s? There seems to be no Internet Connection. Please check your connection, or enable Wi-Fi and try again. OK CANCEL Share Media Upload to Facebook Connection Failure There are no installed apps that can share your %1$s.

Teleprompter can share to Facebook without the app. Would you like to share? The media will be uploaded to Facebook CONTINUE Media queued for upload. Please check notification bar for status. YOU HAVE BEEN LOGGED OUT OF FACEBOOK LOGOUT OF FACEBOOK Permission for Facebook WhatsApp not available WhatsApp needs to be installed to be able to share Videos to another WhatsApp contact. Upload to Facebook Teleprompter requires you to login to Facebook to request below permission(s) to upload Photos/Videos: You have an option to logout before you upload. publish_actions LOGIN TO FACEBOOK NOT NOW Facebook WhatsApp 308890512940081 fb308890512940081 Teleprompter Media Upload Service Google Drive Upload Service Dropbox Upload Service No internet connection. Upload Canceled. File %1$s has been deleted or moved. %1$s Uploaded. %1$s Upload Completed Successfully.
File %2$s %1$s upload in progress %1$s queued for upload. 
 File %2$s %1$s queued for upload. %1$s queued for upload.
Check status bar notification for status. Finishing Upload. Upload Interrupted Upload in Progress Uploading to %1$s Auto Upload in Progress %1$s Upload Completed Possible Connection Loss.
Retry for %1$d secs (%2$d).... Possible Connection Loss. Retrying... com.whatsapp com.facebook.katana Teleprompter Settings Save Media in Phone Memory SD Card Phone Memory Limit Warning Threshold : %1$s Disabled The amount of phone memory below which you would like a warning. Auto Upload To Cloud Google Drive Dropbox Show Memory Consumed For Video Show how much memory is being consumed by the current video recording, in the recording window. Enable Shutter Sound Enable shutter sound of camera when clicking photos.

May not be supported on some devices. OK CANCEL Phone Memory Limit Warning If the amount of available phone memory is below this limit, Teleprompter will give you a warning message before you start to shoot a video. Phone Memory Threshold Threshold value should be
 greater than 0 Please enter a number greater than 0 Phone memory threshold set to %1$s %2$s. Disable Threshold Check The threshold entered is the same or more than the internal storage (%1$s %2$s) of your phone. Please enter a lower value. The threshold value cannot be lower than %1$s. Please enter a higher value. Sign in to %1$s CONTINUE NOT NOW This option enables you to automatically upload any videos created from now, onto the cloud.

User Sign in required for the cloud service, to which the user is opting to upload. Sign In failed either due to Internet connection issue or cancellation by user. Signed out of %1$s.

Auto upload has been disabled. Name of the upload folder in %1$s. Create Upload Folder CREATE CANCEL Incorrect characters in folder name. Please try again. Folder Name is empty. Please give a folder name. Folder %1$s Created Successfully. Error creating folder in %1$s. Please check your internet connection and try again. We need the google accounts info to check if you have already signed in. Teleprompter would like to read your contacts, only to check if you have already signed in to your Google Account. 

This is necessary to be able to auto upload to Google Drive.

Click Yes to give permission. Account Check Permission YES NO Teleprompter will now auto upload your videos onto this folder in %1$s.

Please check your notifications for upload status. Teleprompter will now auto upload your videos onto %1$s folder in %2$s.

Please check your notifications for upload status. Fetching Google Account information in your phone for signing into %1$s.

Please Wait... Redirecting to Dropbox Website... Creating folder in %1$s... Sign In to %1$s Total Phone Memory Free Memory Phone Memory Status Folder not created in Google Drive. Please try again. Folder %1$s in %2$s may have been trashed or moved. Please restore it.
If permanently removed, please re-enable auto upload in Settings. Upload Folder error User needs to Sign in to upload to Google Drive.
Please Sign in to Google Account under Android Settings. Google Drive SignIn Error Timed out attempting to upload the file. Please try again later. Timed out error Timed out attempting to retrieve folder info. Please try again later. %1$s Auto Upload Error Auto Upload Enabled Auto Upload Disabled Do you want to continue? Upload Folder The below folder was found to be earlier created using Teleprompter: Checking for earlier created folder in %1$s using Teleprompter.

If not, one will be created now. Checking for earlier created subfolder inside Teleprompter folder in user's %1$s account. Upload Folder Moved/Deleted The earlier created folder %1$s in Dropbox has been moved/deleted.

Setting upload folder as Teleprompter... 169uf2hzn1n0iov Dropbox Upload Folder Teleprompter Create a subfolder inside Teleprompter for my uploads. Folder name has invalid special characters. Please try again. User is not signed in, or, Teleprompter does not have access to its own folder. Please try again later. Access revoked for main folder Teleprompter and its subfolders in Dropbox.

Auto upload has been disabled. Teleprompter requires access to its own folder Apps -> Teleprompter, in your DropBox account.

You will need to Sign in if not done so earlier. 

Do you want to continue? Remove Media Deleting File... Loading Media... Share Photo with Share Video with Phone Memory Limit Exceeded The available Phone Memory is below the threshold of %1$s.

Click OK to continue. The available Phone Memory is below %1$s.

You need to free some space before you can continue to record video/photo. Minimum Threshold Check disabled. Please go to Settings to enable. SD Card Detected SD Card has been detected. Files will be stored in below location.

%1$s

NOTE: If the application is uninstalled, you will lose the files in above location. Gallery will refresh to show SD Card media contents that were created by Teleprompter. SD Card does not contain media or folder created by Teleprompter. SD Card Not Detected SD Card Removed No SD Card has been detected.

Please insert an SD Card and try again. SD Card has been removed.

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. SD Card has been removed.

Gallery will now show media only from Phone Memory. //For SD Card Removed and Empty Messages Teleprompter Folder Does Not Exist Teleprompter folder (com.Teleprompter) does not exist in SD Card. Teleprompter Folder Empty Teleprompter folder (com.Teleprompter) is empty in SD Card.
SD Card has been removed.

Gallery will now show media only from Phone Memory. 

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. No SD Card has been detected.

Please insert an SD Card and try again. 

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. Unable to save video. SD Card has been removed.

Default storage location is now Phone Memory. SD Card Write Error Unable to write onto SD Card. Please verify that SD Card is not Read-only. Teleprompter Gallery %1$d Videos com.Teleprompter.data Flash Mode %1$s not supported by this camera. Front facing camera not available in this device. Camera Preview Video Thumbnail Switch Camera Camera Click Switch to Video Captured Image Record Video Switch to Photo Google Drive Icon Warning Message Photo substitute Zoom not supported for this camera. Unable to delete file Torch On Off Auto Video Resolutions Set the video recording resolution for the camera. HIGH MEDIUM LOW Video Player Choose a player to playback videos. Teleprompter Video Player Teleprompter will use your favorite media player to play videos.

 This can be changed in Video Settings. No External Video Players found.
Teleprompter will use internal player. 4K Video recording will be supported in a later version. Do not Show Again Favorite Video Player CLOSE External Video Player Rear Camera Photo Resolutions Front Camera Photo Resolutions Photo Settings... Video Settings... Feedback Please provide your feedback on any issues you faced with this application, or how the Teleprompter application can be enhanced. Your feedback is valuable and will be kept confidential. SEND FEEDBACK Please enter a feedback. Thank you for your feedback. Sending Feedback... Feedback... Slide View BRIGHTNESS Resolution Back Camera Resolution Front Camera Resolution Set the photo resolution for the rear camera. Set the photo resolution for the front camera. Photo Settings Video Settings FLASH Memory Consumed RECORDING PAUSED ZOOM Click START TIMER to start the timer for Front Facing Camera. START TIMER CANCEL TIMER Front Camera Timer Enable Front Camera Timer. Timer Duration Set the front camera timer duration (in seconds).
